name: unmasculine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not masculine (= having characteristics that are traditionally thought to be typical of or suitable for men): The ballet dancer's athletic style of dancing helped to challenge the preconception that ballet was unmasculine. Skin cancer rates are higher in men because many of them still think that it is unmasculine to apply sun cream.
More examplesFewer examplesIt seems strange that many people still think that rosé wine is an unmasculine drink just because it is pink.He is a big tough guy but likes to wear a distinctly unmasculine-looking necklace.Although it deals with traditionally unmasculine themes, her novel has had a wide appeal among both men and women.
